category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_NX_occ_default_qty_prevent_from_blank
preference.preference_description: Sets the default quantity as 1 for a new component(occurrence) created from NXManager. Valid values are yes/no. The default is 'no' and this puts the quantity field as blank. This is a site preference.
